news.title: Zelda Williams calls out AI videos of her late father Robin Williams
news.summary: Zelda Williams, daughter of late actor Robin Williams, urged fans to stop sharing AI-generated videos that recreate her father's image and voice. She said such deepfake videos are disrespectful and harmful to his legacy, emphasizing the need for consent even after death.

caption: Where's the line? Zelda Williams is asking fans to stop sending AI-generated videos of her late dad, calling them disrespectful and gross. Consent isn't optional — even for the deceased. How should we protect a person's likeness in the age of AI? #AIArt #GenerativeArt #DigitalArt
imagePrompt: NO TEXT. Abstract digital art representing Zelda Williams calls out AI videos of her late father Robin Williams. Colors: prussian blue, ruby, orchid, bronze, jade. Flowing shapes, glowing ribbons, particles, futuristic polished.
